mdx.rawBody:
Song  : nenjakkoottil
Film  : DISHYUM
MUSIC : VIJAY ANTONY
SINGER: JEYADEV & RAJALEKSHMI
---
Notes:  s r2 m1 p d3 n3 S

nenjakkoottil neeyE   niRkiRAy peNNE  neRRippottil theeyai vaikkiRAy
n. s  r   r   rp pmpm r  n.srs n.n.p. n. s  r  r   r  pmpm r   n.s

kattippOttu kAdhal  seygiRAy mudhugil katteRumbu pOlE   oorgiRAy
n. s  r  r  rp pmpm r  n.srs n.n.n.p. n. s r  r  r pmpm r  n.s

kAdhal thAnE idhu kAdhal thAnE
p m    rm mp pp   d p    rp mp

unnai ninaippadhai niRuTHivittAl nenju Enadi   thudikkavillai
p m   m r   r r    r p p  m  mr  r  s  sn.n.n. s  s  s s  s

eNNam yAvaiyum azhiTHuvittEn innum poomugam maRakkavillai
p m   mr r r   rp  p  m  mr  r s   sn.n.n.  n.s  s s  s n.srsn.p.

Stanza 1:
Ey    viNNaiTHodaikkinRa mugilai veLLi nilavai  manjaL natchaTHiraTHai
n.p.s s  s  s  s   s  s  s n.p.  s  s  s n.n.p. s  s   n. r  s  n.n.p.

ennai thEdi maNNil varavazhaiTHu unnai kAdhalippathai uraippEn
s s   s  s  s  s   s n.n.p.  p.  s s   s n. n. p.p.   m.m. p.

inRu piRakkinRa pookkum  siRu pullukkum kAdhal uraiTHu mudiTHEn
s s  s s  s  s  sn. n.p. s s  s  n.n.p. s  s   sn. r   s n.n.p.

uLLam kAdhalikkum unakkumattum innum sollavillaiyE illaiyE
s s   s s  s  s   n.s n.p. p.  s s   n. s n. p. p. m.m. p.

latcham pala latcham enRu thAy mozhiyil sollirukka oRRa sollu sikkavillai edhanAlE
m  p    p m  m  r    r m  m    p p  m   m  r r  m  m p  p  m  m  r r  r   rm  pSn

panthi vaCHa veettukkAri pATHiraTHai kazhuvittu pattiniyA kidappALE adhupOlE...
m  p   p m   m   r  r m  m p  p m    m r  r  m  m  p p m  m r  r s  ss  s n.smrsn.

Stanza 2: (notes similar to Stanza 1)
chinna chinna chella kurumbum seeni sirippum ennai seerazhikkuthE
viruviruvena vaLarum pazham en virathanggaLai velluthE
unnai karampaRRi ezhuTHu vaLai udaiTHu kAdhal sollida solluthE
vetkam irupakkam meesai muLaiTHu ennai kuTHi kuTHiyE kolluthE
kAdhalenRa veedhi vazhi kaiyai veesi vantha pinnum kAl kadukka kATHirukkEn edhanAlE
February mAsaTHukku nALu oNNu koodi vara ANdu nAlu kATHirukkum adhupOlA..
